pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā dabbo mallaputto saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapeti bhattāni ca uddisati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū navakā ceva honti appapuññā ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.4: Yāni saṃghassa lāmakāni senāsanāni tāni tesaṃ pāpuṇanti lāmakāni ca bhattāni.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.5: Te āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.6: “chandāya dabbo mallaputto senāsanaṃ paññapeti, chandāya ca bhattāni uddisatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.8: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.9: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:1.16: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū—“‘
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.2: bhagavatā ujjhāpanakaṃ paṭikkhittan’ti ‘ettāvatā bhikkhū sossantī’”ti bhikkhūnaṃ sāmantā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ khiyyanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.3: “chandāya dabbo mallaputto senāsanaṃ paññapeti, chandāya ca bhattāni uddisatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.5: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ khiyyissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.6: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ khiyyathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ khiyyissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:2.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.1.2: upasampannaṃ saṃghena sammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakaṃ vā bhattuddesakaṃ vā yāgubhājakaṃ vā phalabhājakaṃ vā khajjabhājakaṃ vā appamattakavissajjakaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo, ayasaṃ kattukāmo, maṅkukattukāmo, upasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.1.3: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī ujjhāpanake khiyyanake āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.1.4: Dhammakamme vematiko ujjhāpanake khiyyanake āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.1.5: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī ujjhāpanake khiyyanake āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.2.1: Anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.2.2: Upasampannaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakaṃ vā bhattuddesakaṃ vā yāgubhājakaṃ vā phalabhājakaṃ vā khajjabhājakaṃ vā appamattakavissajjakaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo, ayasaṃ kattukāmo, maṅkukattukāmo, upasampannaṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc13:3.2.3: Anupasampannaṃ saṃghena sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vā senāsanapaññāpakaṃ vā bhattuddesakaṃ vā yāgubhājakaṃ vā phalabhājakaṃ vā khajjabhājakaṃ vā appamattakavissajjakaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo, ayasaṃ kattukāmo, maṅkukattukāmo, upasampannaṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
